publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3181 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Community Care (Personal Care and Nursing care) (Scotland) Regulations 2002—That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of the draft Community Care (Personal Care and Nursing Care) (Scotland) Regulations 2002, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Frank McAveety*

S1M-3181 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Community Care (Personal Care and Nursing care) (Scotland) Regulations 2002—That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of the draft Community Care (Personal Care and Nursing Care) (Scotland) Regulations 2002, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Frank McAveety
